short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to lower the brightness of the browser with zero invasion of privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brightness Lowerer, minimal code and not going to track/read anything on your tabs. 

1.0 has 4 brightness options including 100%. Might add a new menu/different updated percentage selection options. Open to feedback.
